name: accessibility-gateway-load-tests
description: K6 Load Tests for Accessibility Gateway

scripts.test:concurrent-20: k6 run --env USERS=20 --env TEST_LEVEL=light --env SCENARIO_TYPE=full scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-20-simple: k6 run --env USERS=20 --env TEST_LEVEL=light --env SCENARIO_TYPE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-50: k6 run --env USERS=50 --env TEST_LEVEL=medium --env SCENARIO_TYPE=full scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-50-simple: k6 run --env USERS=50 --env TEST_LEVEL=medium --env SCENARIO_TYPE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-100: k6 run --env USERS=100 --env TEST_LEVEL=high --env SCENARIO_TYPE=full scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-100-simple: k6 run --env USERS=100 --env TEST_LEVEL=high --env SCENARIO_TYPE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-500: k6 run --env USERS=500 --env TEST_LEVEL=extreme --env SCENARIO_TYPE=full scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:concurrent-500-simple: k6 run --env USERS=500 --env TEST_LEVEL=extreme --env SCENARIO_TYPE=simple scenarios/concurrent-users-generic.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress
scripts.test:concurrent-all: npm run test:concurrent-20 && npm run test:concurrent-50 && npm run test:concurrent-100
scripts.test:concurrent-all-simple: npm run test:concurrent-20-simple && npm run test:concurrent-50-simple && npm run test:concurrent-100-simple
scripts.report: k6 run --out json=results.json scenarios/load-test.js && node utils/generate-report.js
